title: Add observability on GRPC server connections
body:
## Bug Report

I would really like to see more observability in TiKV GRPC. I am specifically looking for health metrics https://grpc.io/docs/guides/health-checking/ and grpc status codes metrics. I think it might help us to figure out what type network errors are going on in the system.
